definitions.definition: Divided into a grid of squares of alternating colours or shades, or into light and dark patches .
Changeable ; inconsistent ; having variations or uncertainty ; marked by many problems or failures .

main_definition: Divided into a grid of squares of alternating colours or shades, or into light and dark patches .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Changeable ; inconsistent ; having variations or uncertainty ; marked by many problems or failures .
